name: lzbase62
description: LZ77(LZSS) based compression algorithm in base62 for JavaScript

scripts.compile: browserify src/index.js -o lzbase62.js -s lzbase62 -p [ bannerify --file src/banner.js ] --no-bundle-external --bare
scripts.watch: watchify src/index.js -o lzbase62.js -s lzbase62 -p [ bannerify --file src/banner.js ] --no-bundle-external --bare --poll=200 -v
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run minify

author: polygon planet <polygon.planet.aqua@gmail.com>
